title: Labour market statistics
notice: This content has been migrated directly from our previous site for this beta and is currently in a temporary format. We are working to update these to a new format during the course of the beta.
lede: This dataset contains estimates of labour market statistics (including employment, unemployment and economic inactivity) for the United Kingdom.
